q: book details the behind-the-scenes stories of Michael Vick 's surviving dogs and the influence, resilience, dedication and commitment of the animal behavior experts, animal-care groups, lawyers and government officials that united to save them. I didn't interview Michael Vick for this book because to me the story was more about what happened afterwards, which was an amazing thing, says Gorant.
